articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description: iPhone users will be able to purchase and transfer crypto into Metamask using credit and debit cards.
articles.title: MetaMask Update Allows Apple Pay Users to Buy Crypto

articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description: DFK launches Crystalvale on Avalanche subnet.
articles.title: DeFi Kingdoms Goes Live On Avalanche Subnet

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description: Tesla is financing a repair center with a MakerDAO-powered loan.
articles.title: Tesla Taps MakerDAO-Powered Lender for $7.8M Real Estate Deal

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description: European crypto firms may soon be forced to implement KYC (Know Your Client) procedures for non-custodial wallets that they transact with.
articles.title: European Parliament Passes Bill Requiring Crypto Firms to KYC Non-Custodial Wallets

articles.author: Robin Schmidt
articles.description: The Ethereum Merge is the biggest story in town right now as the fruit of tireless core developers’ labour receives its final preparations before taking its place as the centrepiece of an enormous blockchain banquet. Will it blend seamlessly or will it burst asunder and make a horrible mess of everything?
articles.title: The Best Ethereum Merge Explainer You’ll Ever See
